thread.title: Monday Blues: Eastern politician caught pants down with 'Mpango wa kando' in Umoja
thread.title_full: Monday Blues: Eastern politician caught pants down with 'Mpango wa kando' in Umoja

title: Monday Blues: Eastern politician caught pants down with 'Mpango wa kando' in Umoja
text:
By Stevens Muendo Monday, Oct 26th 2015 at 09:44 Photo posed by models courtesy of Bossip.com 
A politician who had a habit of visiting his ‘mpango wa kando’ at her Umoja house was busted by the woman’s lover over the weekend in what seems to be a love triangle. 
The mheshimiwa went to the woman’s house on Saturday evening and packed his car at the compound, after which he went to the woman’s house. But little did he know that the woman’s other lover had been tipped off on his habit and on this day, he had laid a trap on him. 
According to sources, the said man deflated the tyres of the politician’s car, after which he proceeded to the house where he caught the two in the act. And after an awkward verbal exchange, the politician headed to the car only to find that all the tyres were flat! What a shame, and with people milling all around him, knowing well what his mission in their neighbourhood had been. 
The popular politician from Lower Eastern lost his political bid during the last elections while the ‘mpango’ is a businesswoman. SIMILAR STORIES
